name: UP2037603: Telegraphist Simulator
description:
This game allows the player to select from 4 difficulties (ranging from simple messages like SOS to the entire length of the Zimmermann telegram) of messages which they must then transmit by morse.

Unfortunately, due to time constraints, the scoring mechanic is basic and the sensitivity of the morse code could be further refined with time.

Click sound produced by Sebastian of Click2 Sounds.
